subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Miami Dolphins linebacker Joey Porter was fined nearly $150,000 by the N.F.L. for his part in a scuffle with another player in Las Vegas.The Dolphins said yesterday that Porter has to pay $141,176 for punching Levi Jones, a Cincinnati Bengals offensive lineman, on March 18 after a disagreement in the Palms hotel-casino.
